patthana11.7:1.1: Nakusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.7:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana11.7:3.1: Nakusalaṃ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.7:4.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha nava. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana11.7:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana11.7:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naapacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.7:7.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṃ natthi.)
patthana11.7:8.1: Nakusalaṃ nasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ naasekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.7:9.1: Nakusalaṃ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana11.7:10.1: Nakusalaṃ naparittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
patthana11.7:11.1: Nakusalaṃ namahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ naappamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana11.7:12.1: Nakusalaṃ naparittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ namahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṃ naappamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana11.7:13.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
